summary:
This is the shout version of my improved spells mod:
https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/90428/?tab=description
Like the improved spells mod. i modified the shouts so they are useful at high levels.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Animal allegiance:[/b]
cd: 20/30/40
Radius: 250/500/750
lvl: 35/70/100
dur: 5min/10min/15min

[b]Aura whisper:[/b]
cd: 3/5/7
radius: 600/700/800
dur: 20/40/60

[b]Battle fury:[/b]
cd: 10/18/22
speed: 1.5/1.8/2.0
dur: 1min/2min/3min

[b]Become ethereal:[/b]
cd: 7/15/20
Dur: 15/30/45

[b]Bend will:[/b]
cd: 3/45/60
dur: 0/10min/15min

[b]Call dragon:[/b]
cd: 0/0/10

[b]Call of valor[/b] (also summons gormlaith on 2nd word,summons all on 3rd):
cd: 60/60/60
dur: 5min/5min/5min

[b]Clear skies:[/b]
cd: 3/5/7
dur: 2min/3min/4min

[b]Cyclone:[/b]
cd: 22/30/45
damage: 150/200/250

[b]Disarm:[/b]
cd: 10/15/18
lvl: 35/70/150

[b]Dismay:[/b]
cd: 15/22/30
lvl: 35/70/150
dur: 1min/2min/3min

[b]Dragon aspect(can only be used once per day):[/b]
cd: 3/3/3
dur: 1d/1d/1d
damage: 50/75/100
armor: 150/300/450
fire/frost resist: 0/25/50

[b]Dragonrend:[/b]
cd: 7/10/15
dur: 30s/45s/1min

[b]Drain vitality(absorbs instead):[/b]
cd: 15/22/30
absorb: 10/15/25
dur: 30s/45s/1min

[b]Elemental fury:[/b]
cd: 15/22/30
dur: 30s/45s/1min
speed: 1.5/1.8/2.0

[b]Fire breath:[/b]
cd: 22/30/40
damage: 250/500/750
dur: 15/15/15

[b]Frost breath:[/b]
cd: 22/30/40
damage: 250/500/750
dur: 15/15/15
slow: 80/90/100

[b]Ice form:[/b]
cd: 22/40/50
damage: 10/15/20
dur: eternity/eternity/eternity

[b]Kyne's peace:[/b]
cd: 15/22/30
radius: 150/300/500
lvl: 35/70/100
dur: 20min/30min/40min

[b]Marked for death:[/b]
cd: 15/22/30
damage: 5/8/10
dur: 2min/3min/4min
armor: 100/150/200

[b]Slow time:[/b]
cd: 22/30/45
slow: 90/95/100
dur: 20/30/45

[b]Soul tear(first and second word now also deals damage and also soul traps):[/b]
cd: 3/3/50
damage: 250/500/750
soultrap: 5/15/30
reanimate: 0/0/eternity

[b]Storm call:[/b]
cd: 120/180/240
damage: 150/200/250
dur: 2min/3min/4min

[b]Summon durnehviir:[/b]
cd: 0/0/60

[b]Throw voice:[/b]
Cd: 3/3/3

[b]Unrelenting force:[/b]
cd: 10/15/18
damage: 100/150/200

[b]Whirlwind sprint:[/b]
cd: 5/5/5

--------------------------------------
Force without effort(no changes).

Eternal spirit
your health recovers 500% faster.

Fire within:
Deals 100% more damage.

Dragonborn Frost:
dur: 20/30/45
author: Glen
